main.name: Jorge Sepulveda
main.bio: My name is Jorge Sepulveda, I am Full Stack JavaScript Developer who is currently working at OneUnited Bank. I have a passion for technology and coding.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.
